Windows XP holds a special place in many nerdy hearts, but is it really worthy of GOAT status? We challenged some Windows XP newbies - and that one guy that owns a display - to take on some simple XP-era tasks to see if it really was as great as people remember.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1585798-young-people-try-windows-xp/
